page.title: 15Voe's Churches.
page.content: Voe's first church was built in the late eighteenth century.This church is now in ruins. Voe's second church was opened in 1860.It was a two storey building made of limestone.This building had large arched stained glass windows.The pews were wooden and at the end of each pew was a small door which opened to provide a space for small children to sit.This church closed forty years ago because it had a crack on one side.The people in Voe thought it could be repaired but in the end it was demolished. The present day church was constructed soon after.It was very small compared to the previous church.The church is white washed with blue windows.A weekly service is conducted on Sunday at noon by Rev.G.Simm.
